issue.title: FormHtmlGenerator uses external resources (blank gif)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

FormHtmlGenerator uses external resources (blank gif).
In \joomla\easysdi\com_easysdi_catalog\src\site\libraries\easysdi\FormHtmlGenerator.php:Line855

// path to Ext images
Ext.BLANK_IMAGE_URL = 'http://gis.bnhelp.cz/wwwlibs/ext/ext3/resources/images/default/s.gif';

This make easySDI dependent to this site and creates mixed content on https sites.


**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We should use Snecha's gif (https://www.sencha.com/s.gif) or include it in component (personal preference)
